org.sxb.log

クラス Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.log.Logger
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    JdkLogger, Log4jLogger

    public abstract class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    The five logging levels used by Log are (in order): 1. DEBUG (the least serious) 2. INFO 3. WARN 4. ERROR 5. FATAL (the most serious)
